detectors.description: Crowdsale.buyTokens(address) (contractSource/scsc/Privatix_presale.sol#127-143) ignores return value by token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (contractSource/scsc/Privatix_presale.sol#139)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens(address) (contractSource/scsc/Privatix_presale.sol#127-143):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (contractSource/scsc/Privatix_presale.sol#139)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokenPurchase(msg.sender,beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens) (contractSource/scsc/Privatix_presale.sol#140)
